document_name: Integrating Rio Conventions Provisions into Ukraine's National Policy Framework
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/UKR/Initiation Plan_Integraring Rio Convention Provisions into National Policies.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The work undertaken during the initiation stage serves to develop a project document that will ensure integration of the provisions of Rio Conventions into Ukraine's national policies. This encompasses preparation of baseline studies on current state and recommendations related to institutional capacity, organizational capacity, public awareness raising, as well as endorsement of the project objectives, outcomes, outputs and activities by the government, and exploration of potential partnership with bilateral and multilateral donor organizations.

project_descr: Integrating Rio Convention Provisions Into Ukraine's National Policy Framework
project_title: Integrating Rio Conventions into National Policies
